entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.8Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
